outputs.name: lum_poly
outputs.description: Geometric representation of the luminous opening.

outputs.name: lum_web
outputs.description: Geometric representation of the candela distribution of the luminaire.

outputs.name: lum_axes
outputs.description: Line representation of the C0-G0 axes of the luminaire.

inputs.name: _scale_
inputs.description:
A scalar value to scale the geometry. By default the geometry
is normalized to Rhino model units as a base scale. The scalar value
is multiplied with this base scale.

code:
try:
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.config import conversion_to_meters
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.fromobjects import luminaire_objects
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.{{plugin}} import all_required_inputs, list_to_data_tree,   \
        give_warning
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import ladybug_{{cad}}:\n\t{}'.format(e))


if all_required_inputs(ghenv.Component):
    base_scale = 1 / conversion_to_meters()
    scale = base_scale if _scale_ is None else base_scale * _scale_
    
    luminaire_web, luminaire_poly, luminaire_axes = luminaire_objects(_luminaire, scale)
    
    lum_web = list_to_data_tree(luminaire_web)
    lum_poly = list_to_data_tree(luminaire_poly)
    lum_axes = list_to_data_tree(luminaire_axes)
